title: Design and Improvement Process for Online Interactive Social Learning Modules

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of Fundamental Social Studies Concepts at the Middle School Level
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based access environment, possessing self-directed learning competencies

learning_goals: Learners can analyze causes and solutions of social issues with over 80% accuracy through interactive activities in online modules
Learners can master 15 core concepts of social studies subjects with over 90% proficiency using a feedback-based iterative learning system
Learners can achieve a 75% voluntary participation rate of at least three times per week through mobile-optimized module design

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
